content: i fill diesel for car full tank after i use shell asia app points added but after one hour debit poor and frauds. so i usein now other services i don't recommend this shell those are frauds.i rise a with mail and twitter no response thanks for the worst and worst service
avoid. typical useless app, adding inconveniences. quicker to use your payment card directly at the fuel pump terminal.
always having problems with their otp and no resolutions found. other older reviews complain about the same problem. but they respond as though the problem has never occurred before. disappointing.
useless initiative... waste my time install this apps

dumb app. the person who designed the flow of the payment transaction must have never pumped fuel at a petrol station before. it takes too long just to execute a payment with credit card on the app. the verification otp is unnecessary for each payment. reward points are lame and not at par with setel. pathetic app.
